a.font: New version of GP with new installation procedure using NetBeans Modules is available

description.p:
This is the home page of the Gui Platform Project.
The purpose of this project is to provide a standard GUI development platform for the future Controls GUI software needed for the SPS and the LHC. It shall enable teams to contribute modules to a common controls GUI, and provide common GUI components that can be shared and re-used.
These pages are still being updated and enhanced. Suggestions and comments are welcome. Thanks in advance for your participation/help. E.R.
